articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Epic Games' Fortnite is back in US Google Play Store, as court partially reverses restrictions it won on iOS - TechCrunch
articles.description: The game is back on the Google Play Store, but another court decision is rolling back some of the developer-friendly changes on iOS.
articles.content:
Epic Games’ popular battle royale, Fortnite, has returned to the U.S. Google Play Store following a court order. 
The game maker had recently settled its five-year legal battle with the tech giant, … [+2151 chars]
